message: Identified critical race condition areas in dual-mode data logging system

data.dual_logging_pattern: continuous_parameter_logger logs to parameter_value_history always, plus process_data_points during processing

message: Analyzed existing transactional data layer - comprehensive implementation with advanced features discovered

transactional_components: Atomic dual-table writes with rollback capability
data.testing_strategy: Build comprehensive test suite targeting atomic operations, failure recovery, and concurrent access patterns
